column4: hello :) can anybody help me out? none of my video players will open any video files
: well are you a movie freak?
: are you adult
I believe that on my other computer it works fine (same ubuntu) and I think it was working on here as well... I dont know when it went wrong, yes I am an adult
: there is an adult filter which you have to turn off recently introduced in ubuntu submitting age proof. have u done that?
where is it?
: :-) was kidding man.
: any errors u r getting
only Mplayer returns me an error
: what error?
Error opening/initialazing the selected video_out (-vo) device
: wait a min
: Log in as root. Browse to / etc / mplayer and dou ble click mplayer.conf. Make the changes shown in the pictures :
ok

I can't find gift in video settings, and actually all the lines in video settings are commented out. audio, there was ao=alsa, but then there is also ao=sdl:esd that is commented out at the moment. Do you want me to uncomment it and delete that ":esd" bit?
: leave it
: try with this option on a terminal "gmplayer - vo sdl"
: dont change
: try with this option on a terminal "gmplayer - vo sdl"
error: Failed to open /etc/mplayer/sdl
: what is your video out device
are you asking me about my graphics card?
are you still there?
